video_title: This trick will help you to master your MEDITATION SKILLS  #podcast #motivation #adviceoftheday
transcript:
a lot of people struggle with meditation
because they think that they're supposed
to stop thinking I'm like no that's not
what it is when I went to to Thailand I
spent a day with a monk and one of the
things he said is that meditating is not
getting rid of your thoughts meditating
is observing your thoughts what comes in
in meditation when there is no external
stimuli you can't see anything you're
not scrolling through your phone you're
not keeping busy all day long is just a
heightened experience of what's bubbling
under the surface all the time
